title: Spendin Admin Dashboard
description: Built and improved the admin dashboard for Spendin using SvelteKit, TypeScript, and Tailwind.

title: Bit54/Monierate Products
description: Developed key products at Bit54/Monierate, including the account system, API docs, price alert feature, and wallet system, all with SvelteKit, TypeScript, and Tailwind.

title: Benue International Marathon
description: Launched the Benue International Marathon registration site using Tailwind and PHP.

title: My Football News App
description: Published the My Football News App with PHP, HTML, CSS, and a PWA version on Play Store.
